contains_no_content_of_requested_type.description: Set to true if the input text contains no recipes. Otherwise, set to false.

entries.description: List of historical recipes extracted from text. If no recipes are found, return an empty array.

recipe_text_original.description: Complete recipe text verbatim in its original language (preserve spelling, diacritics, and formatting).

recipe_text_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the complete recipe text. Use modern english equivalent if text is already in english.

title_original.description: Recipe title exactly as it appears in the source (preserve spelling and diacritics). Use null if no title is given.

title_modern_english.description: Modern English translation or the original recipe title. Use null if no title is given.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients with original names, translations, quantities, and preparation notes.

name_original.description: Ingredient name as it appears in source (preserve spelling and diacritics). Example: 'farine' or 'sucre'.

name_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the ingredient. Example: 'flour' or 'sugar'.

quantity_original.description: Quantity as recorded in source. Example: 'une poignée' or 'deux livres'. Use null if not specified.

quantity_standardized_value.description: Numeric value of standardized quantity. Example: 500 or 2 or 1. Use null if cannot be standardized.

quantity_standardized_unit.description: Unit of standardized quantity. Example: 'g' or 'cups' or 'tablespoon'. Use null if cannot be standardized.

preparation_note_original.description: How ingredient should be prepared, as recorded in source. Example: 'haché finement' or 'battu'. Use null if none.

preparation_note_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of preparation note. Example: 'finely chopped' or 'beaten'. Use null if none.

cooking_methods.description: Cooking techniques used in this recipe with original terms and translations.

method_original.description: Cooking method as it appears in source (preserve spelling). Example: 'rôtir' or 'bouillir'.

method_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the cooking method. Example: 'roasting' or 'boiling'.

utensils_equipment.description: Cooking tools and equipment mentioned in the recipe.

utensil_original.description: Utensil as it appears in source (preserve spelling). Example: 'marmite' or 'broche'.

utensil_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the utensil. Example: 'pot' or 'spit'.

yield.description: Yield information with original and modern English versions.

value_original.description: Numeric value of yield as recorded. Example: 6 or 2. Use null if not specified.

unit_original.description: Unit of yield as recorded in source. Example: 'personnes' or 'portions'. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of yield (typically same as original). Example: 6 or 2. Use null if not specified.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of yield unit. Example: 'servings' or 'portions'. Use null if not specified.

preparation_time.description: Preparation time with original and modern English versions.

value_original.description: Numeric value of preparation time as recorded. Example: 2 or 30. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_original.description: Unit of preparation time as recorded in source. Example: 'heures' or 'minutes'. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of preparation time (typically same as original). Example: 2 or 30. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of time unit. Example: 'hours' or 'minutes' or 'overnight'. Use null if not specified.

cooking_time.description: Cooking time with original and modern English versions.

value_original.description: Numeric value of cooking time as recorded. Example: 30 or 2. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_original.description: Unit of cooking time as recorded in source. Example: 'minutes' or 'heures'. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of cooking time (typically same as original). Example: 30 or 2. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of time unit. Example: 'minutes' or 'hours' or 'until golden'. Use null if not specified.

ingredient_categories.description: Boolean flags indicating whether the recipe contains specific categories of historical ingredients.

contains_meat.description: True if the recipe contains meat (beef, pork, lamb, game, etc.).

contains_poultry.description: True if the recipe contains poultry (chicken, duck, goose, etc.).

contains_fish_seafood.description: True if the recipe contains fish or seafood.

contains_dairy.description: True if the recipe contains dairy products (milk, cheese, cream, etc.).

contains_eggs.description: True if the recipe contains eggs.

contains_butter.description: True if the recipe specifically contains butter.

contains_olive_oil.description: True if the recipe specifically contains olive oil.

contains_lard_animal_fat.description: True if the recipe contains lard or other animal fats that are not butter.

contains_alcohol.description: True if the recipe contains alcoholic beverages (wine, beer, spirits, etc.).

contains_refined_sugar.description: True if the recipe contains refined sugar.

contains_honey.description: True if the recipe contains honey as a sweetener.

contains_other_sweeteners.description: True if the recipe contains other sweeteners that are neither honey, nor refined sugar (dried fruit, etc.).

contains_foreign_spices.description: True if the recipe contains imported/exotic spices (pepper, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, ginger, saffron, etc.).

contains_luxury_ingredients.description: True if the recipe contains luxury or high-status ingredients (truffles, caviar, exotic fruits, expensive cuts, etc.).
